Name: Color Game
About the game: Color Game is a puzzle game revolving around changing the color of your player to navigate a level and reach the end. Unlock doors, evade enemies, and figure out the best path to the black tile. This game is still in development, here are the things that have yet to be added: -5 more puzzle mechanics -Updated art assets -Rudimentary story
Meta Title: Color Game: Jun 1, 2020, Thomas Watson and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Color Game? Check out the release date (Jun 1, 2020), developer insights from Thomas Watson, and a complete game summary.
